Princeton Hot SpringsHaji MahmoodFacebookTwitterEmailRent a cabin at Mount Princeton Hot Springs Resort and walk to these natural & odorless hot springs. Mount Princeton Hot Springs Resort is the perfect meeting place for business or pleasure.
